product.title: IG INGLAM Air Straightener - Advanced One-Step High-Speed Airflow Hair Straightener & Dryer with 110,000 RPM Brushless Motor, Airflow Flat Iron with 200 Million Negative Ions,Pink
product.description: We have fully considered the women's pain points and calls for hair straightening, and the best way is to remove the heating plate used in traditional straighteners. Without the heating plate, it will not cause irreversible damage to the hair. At the same time, we adopt a linear air outlet design for ventilation, equipped with a high-speed brushless motor, to create a natural and straight hairstyle.Kind Tips: 1. The product's air exit area may become hot during use. Allow it to cool before touching. 2. PRESS IT FOR A WHOLE 3 SECONDS TO TURN ON/OFF MACHINE

product.description_full:
We have fully considered the women's pain points and calls for hair straightening, and the best way is to remove the heating plate used in traditional straighteners. Without the heating plate, it will not cause irreversible damage to the hair. At the same time, we adopt a linear air outlet design for ventilation, equipped with a high-speed brushless motor, to create a natural and straight hairstyle.Kind Tips: 1. The product's air exit area may become hot during use. Allow it to cool before touching. 2. PRESS IT FOR A WHOLE 3 SECONDS TO TURN ON/OFF MACHINE * Revolutionary Hot Plate-Free Design: Many traditional hair straighteners on the market have problems such as high-temperature damage to hair and hand burns. Now, The IG INGLAM Air Straightener features a cutting-edge hot plate-free design, using powerful airflow to straighten hair without heat damage. Perfect for safe and gentle styling, it's an ideal choice for those looking to avoid hair damage while achieving sleek, straight hair.
 * One-Step Styling & Drying Dual Functionality: This innovative hair tool combines hair drying and straightening functions, saving you time and effort. It's perfect for busy mornings or quick touch-ups, ensuring you always look your best with minimal effort. The dual functionality makes it a must-have for anyone looking for a versatile hair straightener and dryer combo.
 * Continuous Negative Ion Care: Emitting 200 million negative ions during use, the IG INGLAM Air Straightener reduces frizz and static, keeping your hair smooth and manageable. The advanced ionic technology ensures a professional finish every time, making it an excellent choice for those seeking to reduce frizz and achieve healthy, shiny hair.
 * Multiple Gear settings & Strong Function: The IG INGLAM Hair Straightener has three wind speed modes, including "LOW" "MEDIUM" and "HIGH" modes and 4 temperature modes include "Normal" , "Cool","Warm","Hot" modes. In terms of performance, this hair straightener is equipped with a 110,000 RPM brushless motor that provides strong and stable airflow., making it ideal for fast and efficient hair drying and straightening. In comparison to hot plate straighteners that rely on extreme heat, wet to dry hair straighteners function by working with ultra-high-speed & low-temperature airflow.
 * "Harmonica" gift design: We got inspiration from the shape of the harmonica and integrated it into the streamlined appearance of the new hair straightener, making it more beautiful and elegant overall. The exquisite gift box design is the best gift choice for your girlfriend, wife, daughter, mother, family, and friends. If you need help, please feel free to contact us, you can use it with confidence!

protection_plans.title: Walmart Protection Plan - 3-Year Plan
protection_plans.description: Protect it today, enjoy it for years. Get award-winning Allstate service and support that goes above and beyond the manufacturer’s warranty. Health & beauty plans cover: Mechanical & electrical failures Breakdowns or failures during normal use Fast repairs & replacements with easy online claims available 24/7Includes 100% parts & labor with no hidden fees When you add your new health & beauty item to cart, be sure to add a Walmart Protection Plan, too. Simply add your plan at checkout. There’s no need to register your plan for it to be active. We’ll email you protection plan details after you check out.
